Absaloms funerall: preached at Banbyrie by a neighbour minister. Or, The lamentation of a louing father for a rebellious child Harris, Robert, 1581-1658.

Printed by William Hall for Thomas Man, At London : 1610.
"To the reader" signed: Robert Harris. On 2 Samuel XVIII, 33. Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
